content: wing to the front of the body tail in brown 1 magic_ring with 6st 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet around 9 4 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet twice in same stitch twice 5sc 11 5 7sc f/o leave a tail for sewing stuff and sew onto the body beak in yellow 1 magic_ring with 3st 3 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet 4 3 2sc increase single_crochet 5 4 3sc increase single_crochet 6 5 2sc increase twice 8 6 3sc increase twice 10 f/o leave a tail for sewing stuff and sew it onto the front of the head leek in white light green and green 1 magic_ring with 4st 4 2-5 single_crochet around 4 rounds 4 <change to light green> 6 single_crochet around 4 7 single_crochet increase single_crochet increase 6 8 single_crochet around 6 <change to green> 9 2sc increase skip 3 4 10 single_crochet around 4 f/o and leave a tail sew the open end closed and hide the yarn inside <continuing with the other fork of the top of the leek> <attach green yarn to the first skipped stitch from round 9> 11 2sc increase 4 12 single_crochet around 4 f/o and leave a tail sew the open end closed and hide the yarn inside eyes glue or sew on black plastic eyes v -shaped frown cut a v shape out of dark brown felt and glue it onto the forehead hairs tie a large knot using two pieces of brown yarn or this should result in 4 strands emerging from the central knot thread each of three of those strands onto your yarn needle insert the needle into a gap between stitches near the top of the head then pull the needle and three strands out through the center of the magic circle on the top of the head hide the fourth strand inside the body and trim it off trim the three hair strands to an appropriate length pattern by *brinady* this is a free pattern you may share it freely and sell the items you make please do not sell the pattern it is a free pattern
